name: Prison Wall
_source: s;Nika;Finally out of that wretched cell.
s;Nika;To think I'll see Frees Village again...
s;Nika;And get his damned voice out of my head.
s;Simon;Hey, we're in the middle of storming the bandit hideout.
s;Nika;You're the right kind of insane if you're serious.
s;Nika;Perhaps a bit too trusting, though.
s;Simon;An enemy of the bandits can't be that bad.
s;Simon;But we'll talk more after this is over.
s;Simon;If we make it out alive.
